website_summaries.verdict: Outdoor Research's vest is thick enough for winter, but light enough to easily pack.
pros: This water and windproof vest includes a cozy hood and an array of colors to choose from
Also comes with a lifetime guarantee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vest for my girlfriend for Christmas and she loves it. She is about 5'5" and the small fits her perfect. Really lightweight and not bulky looking, hood is a good size and can be cinched close on either side. I think the styling is really nice, perfect for most occasions and for layering. Would strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: walkuh

customer_reviews.title: So I exchanged it for a size XS and it's perfect! (I'm 164 cm and 53 kg)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket in size S (my usual size), but the vest was too large for me: baggy around the waist and too long. So I exchanged it for a size XS and it's perfect! (I'm 164 cm and 53 kg). I've worn it ski-touring and around town. I love the 'Desert Sunrire/Mulberry colour, which goes well with one of my Arcteryx jackets. Furthermore, when I made the exchange over the phone with amazon.com, I was given an extra discount, plus free shipping to Canada, which was completely unexpected, but great!
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Flattering fit and pretty shade of red.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. I like the zipped outside pockets and the large pockets on the inside. The construction and shape are nice and it's not bulky. The color is very pretty. The hood will be nice on windy days. I will use this hiking and layer clothing under it and over it.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen C.

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely great vest, both fit and quality.. It was for my daughter and she loves it. I have it as well and also a jacket from OR. Excellent products.
customer_reviews.author: Birke

customer_reviews.title: Sharp + Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these late last fall and have been relying on them ever since. Are well made, warm, comfortable, and reasonably flattering (enough fill for warmth without invoking a Michelin look). My one wish, and hence four rather than five stars, would be for a style sans hood. The hood comes in handy on bitterly cold days but can be restrictive and bulky when temps climb above the high 30s (fahrenheit).
customer_reviews.author: Dolphin

customer_reviews.title: You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these vests. I pretty much wear one every day in the winter. They are light, comfortable and have zipper pockets so you don't lose your keys. Feminine cut is flattering. Very well made. I am 5'9" 135# and wear a medium. Can wear a light sweater under no problem. You will love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nor Cal Mama

customer_reviews.title: love this vest
customer_reviews.text: I've been in outdoor winter sports and backcountry skiing/camping for over 35 years. This is the best vest I've ever owned. It fits well and is clearly feminine but very functional and versatile. I can wear other layers over it when needed but usually just put it over a great long sleeve Athleta top and go! well made, high quality, fits true to size. Outdoor Research also makes a hooded down sweater, same cut and design, with long sleeves, which I also love.
customer_reviews.author: Sacajawea

customer_reviews.title: I'm gonna fall in line with all the great reviews of this vest
customer_reviews.text: I'm gonna fall in line with all the great reviews of this vest. It's light and warm. Zippered pockets are nice. I will say I'm long waisted and this vest fits great. If you're petite, or have a short torso, this vest might be long on you.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: nice fit, lovely color, so functional
customer_reviews.text: Just really great. Flattering. I got a medium, which is a size up for me, so that I could fit sweaters underneath. Still looks good. The pockets are so good too. Fuzzy inside and then there are EXTRA pockets so you can put both hands in the pockets and still put your keys/wallet/weed/whatever you don't want to lose in the inner pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Colored pencils

customer_reviews.title: Great vest. And warm.
customer_reviews.text: This vest is light, packs well into a small bag (supplied) and warm. It's a little larger than I would expect - I usually take a medium and could have fitted into the small, but length is fine (hip). Looking forward to wearing it in our winter.
customer_reviews.author: FL

customer_reviews.title: Vest with a hood, brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old down vest because I needed a hood. This vest is so well designed, comfortable, quality, great collor, really well made. I love the stitching pattern on it. I get so many compliments. I love OR. I became a fan years ago and the quality and style remain superior over the years, without a huge price tag.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Watts

customer_reviews.title: anything as comfortable, light, and warm
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my friend, a very discerning outdoorsy woman. Even though she is very well informed on the outdoor fashion, she has never heard of OR products. I am rating this vest on the basis of her response describing it as not having worn anything as comfortable, light, and warm. Owning OC product myself I was not surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect material, I love it. I can wait when I take it outside
customer_reviews.author: Edita

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This vest looks great and fits perfectly. It doesn't look bulky and is exactly the right amount of down to keep me warm when out walking. Love the gray/pink combination. The length is a little longer than another down vest that I have which makes me very happy - no cold air sneaking up from underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Warmest thing my wife has
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved the color, the fit, and the pattern. However, the hood is not removeable and she ended up trading it out on a vest that has a removeable hood. 5 years of marriage and still learning every day.
customer_reviews.author: Will Evans

customer_reviews.title: Down vest!
customer_reviews.text: Best vest ever! Have it in three colors. Not marshmallow fat looking..cut slimmer, lower back great hood, lightweight and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Escape

customer_reviews.title: must have for your wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: i wear this all the time, lightweight, not too heavy, can wear in moderate weather, and also keeps me warm, not too hot, looks great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: outdoor research women's aria vest
customer_reviews.text: a great vest for outdoor and indoor. I wear petite size 2 normally, bought the xs, it fits perfectly. The hoody itself cuddles around my head is also adjustable to stop the wind from sneaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Jane8689

customer_reviews.title: Hands down my favorite outer ware
customer_reviews.text: Second one I’ve bought! Had to let the first got after 3 years due to spray foam insulation mishap. Use fir hiking, climbing, gardening, farming. Fits under a tain coat well too. Hands down my favorite outer ware.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Warm, attractive and well fitting!
customer_reviews.text: It was just like pictured and a really wonderful shade of red. Very well made. Highly recommended. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace Korth

customer_reviews.title: All Over Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I'm constantly looking for good vests to keep me warm and to accommodate my cell and I-Pod. This vest is perfect. It is very light, warm, and has five pockets(three of them inside). it also can be folded into a very small bag for traveling. The best is that the vest doesn't bulk with the cell and I-Pod in them to make me look heavy and the hood is so light that the vest can actually be the under part of the layered look.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Cosy and well made this is a really good buy. The seams are strong, and the finishing that bit better than most other vests.
customer_reviews.author: Eve H

customer_reviews.title: Can't take it off!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is awesome!! It's the perfect weight - not too puffy, not skimpy, it's ideal for spring and fall. I pretty much wear it all the time. The hood is large enough to accommodate my pony tail and it really warms me up when I wear it. I'm not sure what I did without it!
customer_reviews.author: Rella

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a vest for about a year. I tried everything from cheap to ultra expensive. The fit is flattering but not too tight so you can still wear a light sweater underneath. It is lighter, not one I'd wear on the slopes, but great for 40-60 degree weather. A real gem!
customer_reviews.author: Lucille S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a down vest with a hood for a long time and finally found the perfect one! I love it, love it, love it! Lightweight, warm, great fit ...everything I asked for. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Oma Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Best down vest ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, warm, durable, the hood is so handy, and its just down right cute.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Mast

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I want MORE!
customer_reviews.text: I'm hard to fit: 6' tall. My biggest gripe is most shirts and vests are way too short!! This fits perfectly! I needed something without bulk as I just had our 2nd child 3-months ago and I still have the baby pooch belly. This vest hides that perfectly without adding bulk! WONDERFUL QUALITY!
customer_reviews.author: TriRockMama

customer_reviews.title: Great vest!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 5'6", a size 4, and I ordered a small. It fits perfectly, its light, warm, and so much fun to wear. I love that it has a hood too! Such a great vest. Its exactly what I was looking for, and its a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: C. Zabrodsky

customer_reviews.title: Down Vest
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect, its warm, and stylish. A great product priced right. Very light and easy to pack. Try it on first.
customer_reviews.author: Joan zelko

customer_reviews.title: great vest!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fitting vest. The length is nice and it has a very sleek fit. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love this little vest!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color choices, I settled on Neptune. California comfortable,light weight but warm! good buy! Great Vest!! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Adas

customer_reviews.title: Puzzled about price
customer_reviews.text: I really love this vest... but cannot understand why I had to pay $145 for it when I ordered another one (medium) different colour and it is only $98.00. I had also previously bought another large which was only $98 also. Please explain...
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Kidd

customer_reviews.title: FITS WELL and the perfect way to take a minor chill off!
customer_reviews.text: This vest fits well for an XS, still slightly roomy but an excellent purchase and well worth the price and the quality is lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: High quality vest
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife and she loves it. Very high quality throughout. Tailored fit - so not baggy or bulky, but fits snug at the stomach and flares out a bit at the hips.
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Love this vest!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vest for two seasons now and just love it! I am ready to purchase another one. It is lightweight and perfect for fall, winter and early spring. It is very well made, and has been a perfect addition to my wardrobe. I have had several compliments on it, and cannot wait for my next one to get here!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Godwin

product_meta.title: Outdoor Research Women's Aria Vest
product_meta.description:
WARM, COMPRESSIBLE, INCREDIBLY LIGHTWEIGHT Built to keep you comfortably insulated when the temperature drops, then stuff away into a corner of your pack when not needed. A favorite of the women of Outdoor Research, the vest's high quality 650 fill power goose down insulation and fully adjustable hood keep you cozy during cross-country rambles or while huddled in camp, yet the whole thing stows neatly for uphill slogs.



OUTDOOR RESEARCH WOMEN'S ARIA VEST
ULTRALIGHT DOWN INSULATION FOR BITTER COLD
Warm, compressible and incredibly lightweight, the Aria Vest from Outdoor Research is built to keep you comfortably insulated when the temperature drops, then stuff away into a corner of your pack when not needed. This best selling women's down layer, features high quality 650 down fill insulation and a fully adjustable hood to keep you cozy during cross-country rambles or while huddled in camp. Meanwhile, the entire vest packs down and stows neatly for uphill slogs. For multi-day treks, it packs down so small you'll have a hard time not finding space to bring it along.

KEY FEATURES:
 * 650 fill down insulation
 * Ultralight shell of 100% polyester, 20D ripstop Adjustable hood
 * Internal front zip stormflap
 * Multiple pockets include handwarmer and internal
 * Elastic cuffs
 * Drawcord hem
 * Stuff sack included
 * Average weight: 9.7 ounces
feature_bullets: SHELL: 100% POLYESTER, LINING: 100% POLYESTER, INSULATION: 80% GOOSE DOWN 20% FEATHERS
650+ fill down insulation and ultralight 20D ripstop polyester shell; taffeta lining
Machine Washable, no bleach, medium heat
